compatibility.notes: The HDF5 license is permissive and allows for integration with other software licenses, provided that incompatible licenses are avoided.

key_requirements: Include the copyright notice and license terms in all copies or substantial portions of the software.
If enhancements are made available, grant a non-exclusive, royalty-free perpetual license for those enhancements.
license.name: HDF5
obligations: Retain the copyright notice, list of conditions, and disclaimer in redistributions of source code.
Reproduce the copyright notice, list of conditions, and disclaimer in redistributions in binary form.
Obtain specific prior written permission for using the names of The HDF Group, the University, or any Contributor for endorsement or promotion.
